original_text: Moreover, he made high places in the hill country of Judah and led the inhabitants of Jerusalem into whoredom and made Judah go astray.
korean_text: 여호람이 또 유다 여러 산에 산당을 세워 예루살렘 주민으로 음행하게 하고 또 유다를 미혹하게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Moreover, he made high places in the hill country of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그는 유다 산지에 산당을 세웠고

sentences.original_text: and led the inhabitants of Jerusalem into whoredom
